title: AE脚本：二维卡通人物角色动作MG动画绑定控制AEscripts Joystick‘n Sliders v1.2+使用教程
author: 大众脸
content: AEscripts Joystick‘n Sliders 脚本是一个基于 After Effects 软件的 pose-based 绑定系统，可高效控制二维卡通人物角色的面部或身体动画。用户只需设置上下左右中五个关键姿态，即可通过虚拟摇杆或滑块实时控制角色动画，并自动生成平滑过渡。该工具特别适用于 MG 动画、卡通角色制作及其他需要快速绑定与动画控制的场景。

download_links.name: AE脚本：二维卡通人物角色动作MG动画绑定控制AEscripts Joystick‘n Sliders v1.2

v1.2_update_notes: Update PathShapes now updates paths indirectly controlled by selected controller like a path controlled by sliders which are controlled by a joystick.
Fixed a bug that prevented joystick rigging in comps with certain frame rates.
Made inverse posing default for Sliders.
Fixed some issues with CS6 compatibility.
